arguments.name: Per
arguments.description: The period for which you want to find the interest and must be in the range 1 to nper.

arguments.name: Nper
arguments.description: The total number of payment periods in an annuity.

arguments.name: Pv
arguments.description: The present value, or the lump-sum amount that a series of future payments is worth right now.

arguments.name: Fv
arguments.description: The future value, or a cash balance you want to attain after the last payment is made. If fv is omitted, it is assumed to be 0 (the future value of a loan, for example, is 0).

arguments.name: Type
arguments.description: The number 0 or 1 and indicates when payments are due. If type is omitted, it is assumed to be 0.
